task.title: Create a Time Code
task.shortdesc: Time codes are needed to associate with time code groups. Time codes identify categories of time that can be tracked.

step.cmd: Select the pay type and data type. Data type selections are Time, Numeric, or Currency. Numeric data is helpful for employees who need to submit mileage data on their timesheets. Currency is important when employees live across multiple countries. Currency also enables tips to be entered.
If necessary, enter start and end dates; the time code can only be used in the date range specified.
Select Save. The newly created code appears in the alphabetical list on the Time Codes page.
step.info: You can specify if time codes should be on or off and if the entry type is hourly or duration (Settings > Timesheet Configuration Group [under Screen Configuration] > Update Time Codes). If the data type for a time code is Numeric or Currency, you cannot change anything.
